wikitext.*:
'''Mythlore''', published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]], is a peer-reviewed journal that focuses on the works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], [[C.S. Lewis]], [[Charles Williams]], and the genres of myth and fantasy. Beginning in fall [[2013]], '''Mythlore''' is published twice a year in the spring and fall. The ''Mythlore Index Plus'', which indexes  '''Mythlore''', [[Tolkien Journal]], published conference proceedings, and other publications of the Mythopoeic Society, can be downloaded at the link below.
